title: Excellent
review: It was excellent experience to spend hours sitting on this ghaat.  we really loved it and enjoyed view and peace.

title: The New Sri Satya Sai Ghaat
review: This new Ghaat near Laxmanjhula, has been opened in September 2016 and is very near Laxman Jhula. It is very well maintained and wide and has statues of Ganges, Rudra and Vishnu.

title: Shri Satya Sai Ghat Near Lakshman Jhula
review: Shri Satya sai Ghat is situated near Lakshman Jhula.  We like this place very much.  A giant scene of Ganga River can be seen from here.

title: nice place
review: it is very nice ghaat near laxman jhula. you can spend some time and enjoy. take some photos with statues of ganga and vishnu.

title: Quiet Ghat on Ganga
review: Shri Satya Sai ghat is located near Laxman Jhula. It is very neat and less crowded as compared to other ghats. There are beautiful idols of goddess Ganga and Shiv and Vishnu gods. The ghat is peaceful and one can spend hours sitting and enjoying the calm and soothing environment that the area offers.

title: satya sai ghat
review: this ghat has become so dirty with no maintenance at all over the years and the stench is unbearable.

title: So much more than a Bridge!
review: Fabulous views at the heart and epicentre of Rishikesh. Teaming with all of life suspended over the grey-silver Holy Ganga - including monkeys, travellors and scooters (on a pedestrian bridge!)
